price: (Ibuka) ubwo Nyagasani wawe yabwiraga abamalayika ati “Mu by’ukuri ngiye kurema umuntu mu ibumba.”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
